channel.title: Run Server Error?
channel.description:
Hello, I have recently came in contact with a weird error on my run server, it looks like this
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShops<ShopHandler.java:142> at server.world.ShopHandler.<init><ShopHandler.java:45> at server.world.<clinit><Server.java:64> Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Please help A.S.A.P Thanks, Cody (Codered911)

item.title: Run Server Error?
item.dc:creator: @codered911 codered911
item.description:
@codered911 wrote:

Thanks, It worked, but all i did to shops was add a few items to my donator shop.
Well thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Error?

item.description:
@codered911 wrote:

Hello, I have recently came in contact with a weird error on my run server, it looks like this

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2
at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShopsShopHandler.java:142
at server.world.ShopHandler.ShopHandler.java:45
at server.world.Server.java:64
Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Please help A.S.A.P
Thanks,
Cody (Codered911)
